entities.description: Usage of marijuana or any cannabis product.
The specific year or time frame in which the survey is conducted.
The year when marijuana or cannabis was first used.
The month when marijuana or cannabis was first used.
The time since marijuana or cannabis was last used.
The individual responding to the survey.
Code indicating the quality or status of the data.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the specific year or time frame.
Indicates the year when the respondent first used marijuana or cannabis.
Indicates the month when the respondent first used marijuana or cannabis.
Indicates the time since the respondent last used marijuana or cannabis.
Indicates that the data pertains to a specific individual respondent.
Indicates the quality or status of the survey response data.
